SeeMore.Title: Behind the scenes
SeeMore.Text:
This sample features:

  • Remote signing
  • Scheduled sending
  • Anchor positioning
  • Payments

Code flow:


View the controller and envelope code on GitHub.

Step 1
When the button is selected, we ask the user to provide their account information and information about the phone they would like to purchase.

Step 2
Next we create the first envelope definition. A document is created from a PDF and added to the envelope. Then we create the recipients, and place tabs in the document using anchor strings.

Step 3
Then we create the second envelope that will be scheduled to be sent to the recipient. Both documents include payment tabs; when they have been signed, the payment will be collected through DocuSign.
